RangeIn.description: Distance from object before it spawns

RangeOut.description: Distance from object before it despawns

EaseTimeEnter.description: transition time at the time of invasion (sec) ※ use only events

EaseTimeLeave.description: transition time at the time of withdrawal (sec) ※ use only events

BaseSpacePathPosition.description: [unimplemented] serving as a reference Path position of BaseSpace

TargetUpOffset.description: and UpOffset for Player of Target

TargetFrontOffset.description: and FrontOffset for Player of Target

TargetFrontOffsetMax.description: and FrontOffset for Player of Target

TargetRightOffset.description: and RightOffset for Player of Target
